betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe destruction catalyst is one of the mining tools in the pack. You can increase its range through a keybind. 

BE CAREFUL, this could destroy your base!

It consumes furnace fuels to run, but in the future klein stars will act as batteries!

§fAlchemical energy provided by fuels such as coal and redstone can also be converted to explosive power.
This catalyst should make mining very easy!
